resources.string: 1. Click the \"Start Button\" to begin a new game.
2. You will then be navigated to a \"Clue\" page, that gives a clue to a specific location.
3. You will need to use the clue to find the location. Don\'t worry, if you get stumped feel free to use the \"Hint\" button for help.

4. Once you think you have arrived at the correct location, click \"Found It\" to check whether you are in the correct location.\n\t- If you are in the correct location, and it is not the final clue, the game will navigate you to a page with more information about the location. Once you are ready for the next clue click "Continue".\n\t- If you are in the wrong location the game will prompt you to keep trying.
5. Repeat steps 2 â€“ 4 until you solve the final clue which will be indicated when you are prompted with a congratulatory message.
